name: copy-notion-markdown-link
title: Copy Notion Markdown Link
description: Copy the current Notion page as a Markdown link. Works with Notion desktop app only.
author: atsushi_kawamura

commands.name: get-notion-page-as-markdown-link
commands.title: Copy as Markdown Link
commands.subtitle: Notion
commands.description: Copy the current Notion page as a Markdown link in the format [title](url)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
